tool.name: MTI Analysis and QC Reports
tool.description: Automated generation of HTML analysis and QC reports for Galaxy MTI workflows
tool.command:
#if $reports.selected_report == "QC": python '$__tool_directory__/QC/cycle_concordance.py' --file '$registered_image' --markers '$markers' --pattern '$pattern' &&
python '$__tool_directory__/QC/segmentation_thumbnails.py' --file '$registered_image' --segmentation '$segmentation' --channel '$segmentation_channel' &&
ln -s '$anndata' ./adata.h5ad &&
python '$QC_script' &&
ln -s '$__tool_directory__/QC/QC_template.md' ./QC.md &&
python -m markdown ./QC.md > QC_report.html #end if

configfiles.configfile:
import os import sys import re import numpy as np import pandas as pd import anndata as ad import plotly.graph_objects as go import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from '$__tool_directory__/MTIreport' import quality
quality.plot_cycle_dropout(os.path.join(os.getcwd(),adata.h5ad), pattern = $pattern)

param.name: selected_report
param.label: Select which type of report to generate
param.option: Quality Control Report -- Cycle concordance, registration and segmentation QC for one sample
Sample Analysis Report -- Compositional and spatial analysis for a single sample
Multi-sample Analysis Report -- Compositional and spatial analysis to compare multiple samples

param.name: markers
param.label: CSV file with channel number and marker names
Prefix of nuclear marker in every cycle for registration QC ('DAPI', 'DNA', etc.)
Channel number that was used for segmentation (1-based)
Column name to perform compositional analysis on (default is 'phenotype')
List of marker prefixes to remove from the analysis
param.help: No quotes, separated by comma. Example: entering DAPI will remove all markers with name containing DAPI

param.label: Resolution of the image in microns per pixel
Radius in pixels for neighborhood analysis (Default is 30px)
Run leiden clustering with resolution optimization

param.name: metadata
param.label: CSV file mapping file names to sample name and image resolution
List of marker prefixes to remove from the analysis
param.help: No quotes, separated by comma. Example: entering DAPI will remove all markers with name containing DAPI
